title: S3 Ep20: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 12 – Those Who Know Us Best
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 12 – Those Who Know Us Best
description:
October 8, 2018 / Dennis Perry's friends and family talk about Dennis' life -- and how their experiences with Dennis compare to the claims made against him at trial.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by Quip, Pretty Litter and Zullily.
